content: I was leaning toward Harden as the MVP a for the last month, however, upon inspection of what Westbrook has done in the last week, its undeniable. He has sparked one of the greatest seasons anyone has ever had. The fact that he has sustained such greatness over (potentially) 82 games is a feat untouched. This is ‘06 Kobe on Steroids and Kobe was robbed of the award. We should never let that happen again.
